code: const API_URL='http://localhost:8080/api/auth';export async function register(data){try{const res=await fetch("".concat(API_URL,"/register"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(data)});return res.json();}catch(error){return{error:'Network error'};}}export async function login(data){try{const res=await fetch("".concat(API_URL,"/login"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(data)});return res.json();}catch(error){return{error:'Network error'};}}
